title: Windows 8.1 Pro VL X86 MULTI6 ESD Pre-Activated Apr2014
description:
Windows 8.1 Pro VL X86 MULTI6 ESD Pre-Activated Apr2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  File:		W81.PRO.X86.MULTI6.ESD.Apr2014.iso
 
  Source:	en_windows_8.1_with_update_x86_dvd_4065105
 
  Size: 	2,83GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	0d130717
  MD5:		1321dff7134ca807c1c6c5a2eceae679
  SHA-1: 	bf03efa9e56f5a585d6e96bdd6dba1397bdf29db


[ CONTENTS ]

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:
  * .NET 3.5
  * Hotfixes - 2014-04-08
 
  Setupcomplete / Post-install:
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL
  * Windows 8.1 Pro VL 		   Pre-Activated 


[ LANGUAGES ]

  * de-DE  [German]
  * en-US  [English]  
  * es-ES  [Spanish]   
  * fr-FR  [French]
  * it-IT  [Italian]
  * pt-BR  [Brazilian Portuguese]


[ FEATURES ]
  
  * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)


[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  * Only clean installs can be made with this format, not upgrades. 

  Activation info:
  * Select Pre-Activated after you have selected language to install
  * If the setup ask you for a product key, select Skip.

  Optional software information:
  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * All optional applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers
    which requires connection to internet.
  * Choose any application.
  * Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.
  * To skip all optional software, just click on "Exit".   


 Optional software:
 
  Browsers:
  * Google Chrome
  * Mozilla Firefox
  * Opera Chromium

  Software:
  * 7-zip 9.25
  * Adobe Reader
  * Adobe Flashplayer
  * DirectX
  * MSE
  * WinRAR 5.10

  Media:
  * GOM Player
  * VLC Player
  * Winamp

    
[ Installation ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
